name: unrevealing
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not giving any useful or interesting information, or not showing what you are thinking: There are a few interesting stories in her otherwise unrevealing autobiography. His face was like a mask - hard and unrevealing.
(of clothes) not showing more of the body than is usual: She chose to conceal herself in unrevealing clothes.
More examplesFewer examplesThe interview they broadcast with the doctor involved was unrevealing.She spoke in a voice that was as flat and unrevealing as she could make it.In these cases typical diagnostic studies (CT scans) are usually unrevealing. I was wearing a decidedly unrevealing combination of knitwear and denim.
